filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hi there,歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目,John老師會彙整過去不同國家以及主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get started!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: Jack Dorsey was auctioned off on Tuesday as a non-fungible token, NFT, with the bid surpassing 2.9 million US dollars, around 82.3 million NT dollars. A tweet from the auction platform, Valuables by Cent, read that Jack accepted the offer from Sina Istavi for 2,915,834 USD.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: The auction account added that the tweet is now minted on blockchain.The winner's account details show that Sina Istavi, CEO of Bridge Oracle, a blockchain technology startup, owns the at Sina Istavi account. Dorsey explained that all proceeds from the auction will be donated to charities.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: It was first tweeted on March 21, 2006, with Dorsey writing, just setting up my Twitter.Such a mundane statement became the first tweet ever sent and officially launched Twitter, a global platform that has since become a controversial and dominant force in civil society.I think years later, people will realize the true value of this tweet, like the Mona Lisa painting.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: The auction of Dorsey's tweet also highlights the surge of interest in non-fungible tokens, NFT.Non-fungible tokens uses the same blockchain technology, after cryptocurrencies, to transform objects into virtual collectors' items that cannot be replicated.Dorsey tweeted his thanks to Istavi on Tuesday and added,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: that the proceeds from the auction were donated to Give Directly, a non-profit organization that helps the poor in East Africa.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: The phenomenon gradually attracted the attention of international media,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: and has led the Ministry of Interior to issue a statement cautioning Taiwanese that they only get three chances to change their names in a lifetime.Following media outlets like CNN and BBC's reports, Taiwanese's name-changing craze also reached the ears of US social media users, with some commenting they didn't expect the day Taiwanese would lose their minds.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: However, others wrote that as a broke millennial, if changing their names would mean getting free sushi, then they were all for it.Some also called on American chain restaurants to try similar promotions, with one volunteering to change their name to T-bone, while another wanted donut, so that they could get freebies from Krispy Kreme.Next article
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: Uber will ban passengers with low ratings
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: Uber, however, said the bans for bad behavior won't come as a surprise to offending passengers.Riders will receive several notifications before they lose access to the app, the company said.And they will also have opportunities to improve their ratings to remain in good standing.Tips to boost a user's rating include
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: behavior, avoiding leaving trash in the vehicle, and avoiding requests for drivers to exceed the speed limit, Uber said.Next articleKakao suspends online comments for entertainment articlesSouth Korea's Internet company Kakao said Friday that it would prevent users from posting malicious comments on its online entertainment news articles
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: next month, pledging to also overhaul its search engine functionalities to address cyberbullying.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: Kakao, however, said the decision had not been made because of a single case, and that there had been heated debate over the issue for a long time.The company also decided to suspend its related search word service for celebrities immediately for its messenger app Kakao Talk.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: United we stand, how the Internet merged pop culture and politics.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 線上相關時事趣聞 All about the 2022 Internet.json

chunks.chunk_text: comments on its online entertainment news articles next month, pledging to also overhaul its

chunks.chunk_text: search engine functionalities to address cyberbullying.
